title.rendered: SEGA’s ‘Super Game’ Is Actually Multiple Games, And It Could Include NFTs

content.rendered:
The Japanese company is investing millions of dollars in a most ambitious plan

Some time ago there was talk of SEGA and his “Super Game”, a really ambitious project with which the company would hit the table in the video game scene. Since then there has been a lot of speculation about the company’s real intentions, and perhaps the most famous option was that it is a great AAA game.

Well, today I come to tell you that a large part of the community was wrong, SEGA’s “Super Game” is not a revolutionary title that will change everything. Instead, I think it would be more appropriate to talk about THE PLAN (I had to put my little reference to Fernando Alonso).

What the heck is ‘Super Game’?

  • According to what they say from the middle VGCin an interview translated by them, the executive vice president of SEGA, Shuji Utsumi, revealed that ‘Super Game’ is the name given to the development of several AAA video games❗
  • These works will take advantage of the latest SEGA technologiesand it is estimated that the plan will have a duration of five years⌛
  • According to Utsumi, a ‘Super Game’ has to meet four requirements: Cross-platform, multi-language global development, simultaneous global release, and AAA titles✅
  • Furthermore, this executive He did not rule out at any time that SEGA will use cloud technology or even NFTs for the different projects of ‘Super Game’❗❗

The truth is that I can’t help but feel a little excited about SEGA’s plans. We are first and foremost a giant of Japanese entertainment, and if they are organized properly, they could present something very interesting as a result of all this of the ‘Super Game’. We will have to wait a few years to see if the investment pays off.
